```{r}
x = read.csv(textConnection(

 gene A, B,     Δusp,  2.98
 gene A, B,     Δusp,  3.1
 gene A, C,     WT,     2.4
 gene A, C,     WT,     2.6
 gene A, C,     WT,     2.45
 gene A, C,     Δusp,    3.2
 gene A, C,     Δusp,    3.7
 gene A, C,     Δusp,    3.25 
 gene B, A,     WT,     4.0

 gene B, A,     WT,     3.73
 gene B, A,     Δusp,   1.9

 gene B, A,     Δusp,   2.25

), strip.white = TRUE, header = TRUE)
x = mutate(x,
  celltype = c(A = "aEC", B = "dEC", C = "ISC/EB")[celltype] |> factor(levels = c("ISC/EB", "dEC", "aEC"))
  )
stopifnot(is.numeric(x$value), !any(is.na(x$celltype)))
```

```{r}
#| label: fig_scatter
#| fig-width: 3
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig-dpi: 600

ggplot(x, aes(x = condition, y = value, col = celltype)) + geom_point() +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(gene), rows = vars(celltype)) + ylim(c(1.6, 4)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("aEC" = "#F8766D", "LFC/pEC" = "#B79F00", "ISC/EB" = "#619CFF", "dEC" =  "#00BA38"))
```
